intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: The @nasnet/core library is the shared foundation for the NasNetConnect frontend. It provides type-safe constants, shared TypeScript interfaces, utility functions, and React form/validation infrastructure used by all features.

README.title: Core Library Documentation
README.description: The @nasnet/core library is the shared foundation of the NasNetConnect frontend. It provides

sub-libraries/constants.title: Constants Reference
sub-libraries/constants.description: The @nasnet/core/constants library provides static application constants organized by domain. These are used throughout the frontend for type-safe navigation, API calls, and real-time communication.

sub-libraries/forms.title: Forms & Validation Library Reference
sub-libraries/forms.description: Comprehensive guide to @nasnet/core/forms — the schema-driven forms library with 7-stage validation pipeline

sub-libraries/i18n.title: Internationalization (i18n) Library Reference
sub-libraries/i18n.description: Comprehensive guide to @nasnet/core/i18n — the i18next-powered internationalization system for NasNetConnect

sub-libraries/types.title: Core Types Reference
sub-libraries/types.description: Complete documentation of all types exported from @nasnet/core/types. This library provides the complete type system for NasNetConnect, including the Universal State v2 model, resource management, and domain-specific types.

sub-libraries/utils.title: Core Utils Library Reference
sub-libraries/utils.description: Complete reference for all utility functions exported from @nasnet/core/utils. This library provides network validation, data formatting, React hooks, dependency graph algorithms, log export, and device detection utilities.
